resources.string: Without notification, the system might kill the wakelock to free resources.
User request for screen issues during calls on GT-I9100 devices. The lock will be acquired when the device starts ringing and is released when the call ends.

This app allows you to acquire wakelocks from Androids PowerManager.

It is free of charge and without ads, if it helped and you would have paid for it, there is a 'Donate Version' you can buy on Google Play to support my work.

Reach me under support@darken.eu
